analysis.description:
YouAreRichToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/33/0x4cc34f17a47943a037e3a432ca1399daa0ca0bb7.sol#110-111) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/33/0x4cc34f17a47943a037e3a432ca1399daa0ca0bb7.sol#220-231)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/33/0x4cc34f17a47943a037e3a432ca1399daa0ca0bb7.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/33/0x4cc34f17a47943a037e3a432ca1399daa0ca0bb7.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/33/0x4cc34f17a47943a037e3a432ca1399daa0ca0bb7.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
